text: The men's quadruple sculls competition at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro was held from 6 to 11 August at the Lagoon Rodrigo de Freitas. The medals for the competition were presented by James Tomkins, Australia, member of the International Olympic Committee, and the gifts were presented by Patrick Rombaut, Belgium, Member of the Executive Committee of the International Rowing Federation. ==Results== ===Heats=== First two of each heat qualify to Final A, remainder goes to the repechage. ====Heat 1==== {|class="wikitable" !Rank
